theShade:ShadePurge.NAME: Purge
theShade:ShadePurge.DESCRIPTION: Set your  theshade:Corruption to 0. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
theShade:ShadePurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Set your  theshade:Corruption to 0. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeShadows.NAME: Shadows
theShade:ShadeShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. Shuffle a theshade:Fatigue into your draw pile. Exhaust.
theShade:ShadeShadows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. Shuffle a theshade:Fatigue into your discard pile. Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeFatigue.NAME: Fatigue
theShade:ShadeFatigue.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the start of your turn, if you have any theshade:Fatigues in hand, lose 1 energy (Doesn't stack).

theShade:ShadeSpite.NAME: Spite
theShade:ShadeSpite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Counts as a Curse during combat.

theShade:ShadePursuit.NAME: Pursuit
theShade:ShadePursuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Shuffle 3 Strikes into your draw pile.
theShade:ShadePursuit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Shuffle 3 Upgraded Strikes into your draw pile.

theShade:ShadeStrangle.NAME: Strangle
theShade:ShadeStrangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply 3 Constrict. Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeArcaneLightning.NAME: Arcane Lightning
theShade:ShadeArcaneLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theShade:ShadeShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
theShade:ShadeShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL This attack gets double the damage bonus from  theshade:Corruption.

theShade:ShadeMarkOfTheWitness.NAME: Mark of the Witness
theShade:ShadeMarkOfTheWitness.DESCRIPTION: Apply theshade:Deteriorate to an enemy. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeArcaneFire.NAME: Arcane Fire
theShade:ShadeArcaneFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theshade:Burning to ANY target. NL Draw a card.

theShade:ShadeFade.NAME: Fade
theShade:ShadeFade.DESCRIPTION: If you have taken unblocked damage this turn, gain 1 Intangible.

theShade:ShadeShroud.NAME: Shroud
theShade:ShadeShroud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! theshade:Wither to ANY target.

theShade:ShadeExert.NAME: Exert
theShade:ShadeExert.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a random Curse into your draw pile.

theShade:ShadeForbiddenThoughts.NAME: Forbidden Thoughts
theShade:ShadeForbiddenThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Place Shame on top of your draw pile.

theShade:ShadeDusk.NAME: Dusk
theShade:ShadeDusk.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 theshade:Shadows into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theShade:ShadeDusk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 upgraded theshade:Shadows into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeEncroachingShadows.NAME: Encroaching Shadows
theShade:ShadeEncroachingShadows.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 theshade:Corruption.
theShade:ShadeEncroachingShadows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, gain 1 theshade:Corruption.

theShade:ShadeVesselOfSuffering.NAME: Vessel of Suffering
theShade:ShadeVesselOfSuffering.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage during your turn, gain 1 [E].
theShade:ShadeVesselOfSuffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage, gain 1 [E].

theShade:ShadeSchadenfreude.NAME: Schadenfreude
theShade:ShadeSchadenfreude.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadePossession.NAME: Possession
theShade:ShadePossession.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain 1 Intangible.

theShade:ShadeDefile.NAME: Defile
theShade:ShadeDefile.DESCRIPTION: Transform every card in your hand into a random Curse. Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies for each one.

theShade:ShadeBlackLightning.NAME: Black Lightning
theShade:ShadeBlackLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy for each Curse in your draw pile.
theShade:ShadeBlackLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL (You have !M! Curses in your draw pile.)

theShade:ShadeScourge.NAME: Scourge
theShade:ShadeScourge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Trigger any start-of-turn and end-of-turn effects on the target.
theShade:ShadeScourge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Trigger any start-of-turn and end-of-turn effects on the target twice.

theShade:ShadeFalteringBlade.NAME: Faltering Blade
theShade:ShadeFalteringBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Deal 2 less damage for each stack of theshade:Corruption on you.

theShade:ShadeRebuff.NAME: Rebuff
theShade:ShadeRebuff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy. NL Lose !M! stacks of theshade:Corruption.

theShade:ShadeWitchFire.NAME: Witch Fire
theShade:ShadeWitchFire.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 theshade:Burning and 2 theshade:Wither to ANY target.
theShade:ShadeWitchFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 theshade:Burning and 2 theshade:Wither to ALL enemies.

theShade:ShadeWrithingFlame.NAME: Writhing Flame
theShade:ShadeWrithingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 4 theshade:Burning to the attacker.

theShade:ShadeFeint.NAME: Feint
theShade:ShadeFeint.DESCRIPTION: Force an enemy that intends to attack to attack, and apply !M! Vulnerable to them. NL Draw a card.
theShade:ShadeFeint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: That enemy does not intend to attack!

theShade:ShadeAnoint.NAME: Anoint
theShade:ShadeAnoint.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. Give it a copy of your theshade:Corruption. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeHaunt.NAME: Haunt
theShade:ShadeHaunt.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. At the start of its turns, it is theshade:Shackled for !M!. Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeDeception.NAME: Deception
theShade:ShadeDeception.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your theshade:Corruption, plus !B!.

theShade:ShadeBlackHeart.NAME: Black Heart
theShade:ShadeBlackHeart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theshade:Corruption X times. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeShatter.NAME: Shatter
theShade:ShadeShatter.DESCRIPTION: The next attack you play deals additional damage equal to twice the target's Block.
theShade:ShadeShatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next attack you play deals additional damage equal to three times the target's Block.

theShade:ShadeForbiddenKnowledge.NAME: Forbidden Knowledge
theShade:ShadeForbiddenKnowledge.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each Curse in your draw pile.
theShade:ShadeForbiddenKnowledge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL (You have !M! Curses in your draw pile.)

theShade:ShadeRemission.NAME: Remission
theShade:ShadeRemission.DESCRIPTION: Set your theshade:Corruption to 0. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeShadeDance.NAME: Shade-dance
theShade:ShadeShadeDance.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Intangible to EVERYONE. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeSpreadingCorruption.NAME: Spreading Corruption
theShade:ShadeSpreadingCorruption.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each of your turns, apply theshade:Deteriorate to all enemies that are not Deteriorating.

theShade:ShadeDistortion.NAME: Distortion
theShade:ShadeDistortion.DESCRIPTION: Curses are playable. Whenever you play a Curse, gain 1 energy.
theShade:ShadeDistortion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, transform it into a random Black Card.

theShade:ShadeProlongedSuffering.NAME: Prolonged Suffering
theShade:ShadeProlongedSuffering.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, apply !M! theshade:Wither.

theShade:ShadeOverdrive.NAME: Overdrive
theShade:ShadeOverdrive.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain theshade:Corruption, gain twice as much.

theShade:ShadeChaosStorm.NAME: Chaos Storm
theShade:ShadeChaosStorm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, randomly apply 3 theshade:Corruption, 2 theshade:Wither, or 4 theshade:Burning, or deal 6 damage, to a random enemy.
theShade:ShadeChaosStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, randomly apply 3 theshade:Corruption, 2 theshade:Wither, or 4 theshade:Burning, or deal 6 damage, to each enemy.

theShade:ShadeDefenseAgainstTheDarkArts.NAME: Defense vs. Dark Arts
theShade:ShadeDefenseAgainstTheDarkArts.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add an Ethereal theshade:Rebuff to your hand.
theShade:ShadeDefenseAgainstTheDarkArts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add an upgraded Ethereal theshade:Rebuff to your hand.

theShade:ShadeMidnightHorizon.NAME: Midnight Horizon
theShade:ShadeMidnightHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is replayed against each other enemy.

theShade:ShadeExecute.NAME: Execute
theShade:ShadeExecute.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played !M! additional times if that would kill the target.
theShade:ShadeExecute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played !M! additional times if that would kill the target.

theShade:ShadeOblivion.NAME: Oblivion
theShade:ShadeOblivion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! random Curses into your draw pile.

theShade:ShadeMutualAnnihilation.NAME: Mutual Annihilation
theShade:ShadeMutualAnnihilation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If you have taken unblocked damage 13 times this combat, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theShade:ShadeArcaneTempest.NAME: Arcane Tempest
theShade:ShadeArcaneTempest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.
theShade:ShadeArcaneTempest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X + 1 times.

theShade:ShadePureStrike.NAME: Pure Strike
theShade:ShadePureStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have 0 theshade:Corruption. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
theShade:ShadePureStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I cannot play that card while I have Corruption!

theShade:ShadeFexnil.NAME: Fexnil
theShade:ShadeFexnil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the leftmost enemy, then do it again to each consecutive enemy, doubling the damage each time.

theShade:ShadeArcaneInferno.NAME: Arcane Inferno
theShade:ShadeArcaneInferno.DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 theshade:Burning to EVERYONE, !M! times. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeDeathSentence.NAME: Death Sentence
theShade:ShadeDeathSentence.DESCRIPTION: Apply theshade:Deteriorate and 99 theshade:Wither to ANY target. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeSubversion.NAME: Subversion
theShade:ShadeSubversion.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During your turn, all damage they take is converted into healing. During enemy turn, all healing they receive is converted into damage. Lasts for 1 round. NL Exhaust.
theShade:ShadeSubversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During your turn, all damage they take is converted into healing. During enemy turn, all healing they receive is converted into damage. Lasts for 2 rounds. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeEthericShift.NAME: Etheric Shift
theShade:ShadeEthericShift.DESCRIPTION: Make all cards in your hand Ethereal, and reduce their cost by !M!, until the end of the turn.

theShade:ShadeShadowBarrier.NAME: Shadow Barrier
theShade:ShadeShadowBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your theshade:Corruption. NL Set your theshade:Corruption to 0. At the start of your next turn, gain it all back.

theShade:ShadeElixirOfNoctis.NAME: Elixir of Noctis
theShade:ShadeElixirOfNoctis.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. Put them to sleep for !M! turns. While they sleep, at the end of your turn, they recover 30 HP. NL Exhaust.
theShade:ShadeElixirOfNoctis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. Put them to sleep for !M! turns. While they sleep, at the end of your turn, they recover 50 HP. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeApexCorruption.NAME: Apex Corruption
theShade:ShadeApexCorruption.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each stack of theshade:Corruption you have. NL Gain 3 energy, and draw 3 extra cards, each turn. NL You can no longer gain or lose theshade:Corruption. NL Exhaust.
theShade:ShadeApexCorruption.MOD_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each stack of theshade:Corruption you have. NL Transform all your cards into upgraded Black Cards. NL You can no longer gain or lose theshade:Corruption. NL Exhaust.

theShade:ShadeShadowBlend.NAME: Shadow Blend
theShade:ShadeShadowBlend.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn 3 turns from now, replay all cards you played between now and then with the same targets.

theShade:ShadeAmalgamForm.NAME: Amalgam Form
theShade:ShadeAmalgamForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain block equal to your theshade:Corruption. You can no longer become Intangible.

theShade:ShadeBlightBolt.NAME: Blight Bolt
theShade:ShadeBlightBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a debuffed enemy. Reduce their debuffs by 1.

theShade:ShadeUnveil.NAME: Unveil
theShade:ShadeUnveil.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card in your hand into a random Curse. NL Gain !B! block.

theShade:ShadeConflagration.NAME: Conflagration
theShade:ShadeConflagration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, if you are not Intangible, apply !M! Burning to ALL enemies.
theShade:ShadeConflagration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, if you are not Intangible, apply !M! Burning to ALL enemies.

theShade:ShadeVoodooDoll.NAME: Soul Bind
theShade:ShadeVoodooDoll.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. NL Summon a doll with HP equal to half of theirs. NL Any damage or healing done to the doll also affects the enemy.
theShade:ShadeVoodooDoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. NL Summon a doll with HP equal to 75% of theirs. NL Any damage or healing done to the doll also affects the enemy.

theShade:ShadeInfusion.NAME: Infusion
theShade:ShadeInfusion.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During the next enemy turn, they receive double damage and healing from all sources.
theShade:ShadeInfusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During the next enemy turn, they receive triple damage and healing from all sources.

theShade:ShadeGrudge.NAME: Grudge
theShade:ShadeGrudge.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a copy of your draw pile into your discard pile.

theShade:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theShade:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theShade:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theShade:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theShade:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theShade:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theShade:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theShade:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theShade:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theShade:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theShade:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theShade:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theShade:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
